Question:
Write an aligned 'malloc' and 'free' function that supports allocating memory such that the memory addressed returned is divisible by a specific power of two.
EXAMPLE:
  'aligned_malloc(1000, 128)' will return a memory address that is a multiple of 128 and that points to a memory of size 1000 bytes.
  'aligned_free()' will free memory allocated by 'aligned_malloc'.
Title: Malloc
